chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Samsung Galaxy S21+ 5G is experiencing the following issue:

The phone turns off and restarts for no reason. This happens several times a day, every day. Sometimes, the phone will also beep and I'll lose access to any commands, and I'm forced to reboot.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer will return the item for repair.

Here is his return address: 4 rue Tourville, 38100 Grenoble.

Please keep us informed as soon as you receive the package.

Regards,
Elodie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this and we will await for the arrival of the parcel. Thank you for your patience.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile,

I want to share the customer’s return address : 4 rue Tourville, 38100, Grenoble.

Please let us know as soon as you hear from us. 

Regards,
Elodie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

We are currently processing the device and take note of the address and dateline.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile,

Counting on your return to give us the tracking number.

Regards,
Elodie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
AS
